entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 3:19PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snow Possible Tonight With Accumulation Above 1000 Feet... A mix of rain and snow is expected across the Eastern Interior tonight, including Fairbanks. entry.cap:areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 3:19PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Significant Snowfall In Eastern Alaska Range Through Thursday Morning... Snow is falling in the Eastern Alaska Range, with heavier snow above 3500 feet. entry.cap:areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah

entry.title: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 22 at 3:22AM CDT until September 23 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS

entry.title: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 22 at 3:03AM MDT until September 22 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility under one quarter mile in dense fog. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected.
entry.cap:areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills

entry.title: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 22 at 3:03AM MDT until September 22 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one-half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Central Laramie County including Cheyenne. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

entry.title: High Wind Warning issued September 22 at 3:03AM MDT until September 23 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Interstate 80 near Arlington and Elk Mountain.

entry.title: High Wind Warning issued September 22 at 3:03AM MDT until September 23 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County including Interstate 25 between Wheatland and Chugwater. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM MDT Friday.

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued September 22 at 2:45AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Blowing dust health alert in Effect for the Powder River Basin of Northeastern Wyoming in effect from 6 AM this morning to 4 PM MDT this afternoon... The following message is transmitted in collaboration with the Wyoming Department of Environmental Quality, Air Quality Division. * WHAT...Southeast winds 25-40 mph with gusts to 50 mph.
